languages.text: {n}Воин шумно втягивает носом воздух. Его зрачки чуть расширяются.{/n} "А кто ты так{mf|ой|ая}, чтобы предлагать помощь? От тебя пахнет ксеносами. Ты, вижу, ходишь у них в дружках, а не сидишь в клетке. И от тебя пахнет кем-то еще... Кем-то зловредным и хитрым. Так себе из тебя помощничек".

{n}He loudly sniffs the air and his pupils dilate slightly.{/n} "Who are you to offer me help? You stink of xenos. I see you are on friendly terms with them. You are not sitting in a cage. And you smell of someone else... Someone spiteful and cunning. You cannot help me."
languages.original_text: {n}Воин шумно втягивает носом воздух. Его зрачки чуть расширяются.{/n} "А кто ты так{mf|ой|ая}, чтобы предлагать помощь? От тебя пахнет ксеносами. Ты, вижу, ходишь у них в дружках, а не сидишь в клетке. И от тебя пахнет кем-то еще... Кем-то зловредным и хитрым. Так себе из тебя помощничек".

traits.locale_text: {n}He loudly sniffs the air and his pupils dilate slightly.{/n} "Who are you to offer me help? You stink of xenos. I see you are on friendly terms with them. You are not sitting in a cage. And you smell of someone else... Someone spiteful and cunning. You won't be much good as a helper."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

traits.locale_text: {n}He loudly sniffs the air and his pupils dilate slightly.{/n} "Who are you to offer me help? You stink of xenos. I see you are on friendly terms with them. You are not sitting in a cage. And you smell of someone else... Someone spiteful and cunning. You won't be much good as a helper."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

You are not sitting in a cage. And you smell of someone else... Someone spiteful and cunning. You won't be much good as a helper."

traits.locale_text: {n}He loudly sniffs the air and his pupils dilate slightly.{/n} "Who are you to offer me help? You stink of xenos. I see you are on friendly terms with them. You are not sitting in a cage. And you smell of someone else... Someone spiteful and cunning. You cannot help me."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}他大声地嗅着，瞳孔微微放大。{/n}“你何德何能，居然想为我提供帮助？你身上带着异形的臭味。我看得出来，你和他们之间关系很好。你并没有被关在笼子里，而且，你身上还带着另一个人的味道……一个充满怨恨、性情狡猾的人。你是帮不了我的。”
languages.original_text: {n}He loudly sniffs the air and his pupils dilate slightly.{/n} "Who are you to offer me help? You stink of xenos. I see you are on friendly terms with them. You are not sitting in a cage. And you smell of someone else... Someone spiteful and cunning. You cannot help me."

traits.locale_text: {n}他大声地嗅着，瞳孔微微放大。{/n}“你何德何能，居然想为我提供帮助？你身上带着异形的臭味。我看得出来，你和他们之间关系很好。你并没有被关在笼子里，而且，你身上还带着另一个人的味道……一个充满怨恨、性情狡猾的人。我恐怕不需要你这样的帮手。”
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}彼は大袈裟に空気を嗅ぐ。瞳孔がわずかに開いた。{/n}「俺を助けて何になる？あんたは異種族の臭いがプンプンする。奴らと仲良くやってるんだろ。あんたは囚われの身じゃない。それに、他の臭いもする…腹黒くて狡猾な奴の臭いだ。そんな奴の手を借りるつもりはないね」
languages.original_text: {n}He loudly sniffs the air and his pupils dilate slightly.{/n} "Who are you to offer me help? You stink of xenos. I see you are on friendly terms with them. You are not sitting in a cage. And you smell of someone else... Someone spiteful and cunning. You cannot help me."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は大袈裟に空気を嗅ぐ。瞳孔がわずかに開いた。{/n}「俺を助けて何になる？あんたは異種族の臭いがプンプンする。奴らと仲良くやってるんだろ。あんたは囚われの身じゃない。それに、他の臭いもする…腹黒くて狡猾な奴の臭いだ。そんな奴の手を借りるつもりはないね」
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Olisquea sonoramente y sus pupilas se expanden.{/n} «¿Y quién es para ofrecerme ayuda? Apesta a xenos. Veo que tiene trato amistoso con ellos. No está en una jaula. Y huele a alguien más... a alguien astuto y rencoroso. No podrá ayudarme».
languages.original_text: {n}He loudly sniffs the air and his pupils dilate slightly.{/n} "Who are you to offer me help? You stink of xenos. I see you are on friendly terms with them. You are not sitting in a cage. And you smell of someone else... Someone spiteful and cunning. You cannot help me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Olisquea sonoramente y sus pupilas se expanden.{/n} «¿Y quién es para ofrecerme ayuda? Apesta a xenos. Veo que tiene trato amistoso con ellos. No está en una jaula. Y huele a alguien más... a alguien astuto y rencoroso. No me servirá de mucha ayuda».
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Il hume l'air bruyamment, les pupilles légèrement dilatées.{/n} « Et qui êtes-vous pour me proposer votre aide ? Vous puez le xénos. Je vois que vous avez fait ami-ami avec eux. Vous n'êtes pas en cage et vous dégagez l'odeur de quelqu'un d'autre... Quelqu'un de mauvais et de rusé. Vous ne pouvez rien pour moi. »
languages.original_text: {n}He loudly sniffs the air and his pupils dilate slightly.{/n} "Who are you to offer me help? You stink of xenos. I see you are on friendly terms with them. You are not sitting in a cage. And you smell of someone else... Someone spiteful and cunning. You cannot help me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il hume l'air bruyamment, les pupilles légèrement dilatées.{/n} « Et qui êtes-vous pour me proposer votre aide ? Vous puez le xénos. Je vois que vous avez fait ami-ami avec eux. Vous n'êtes pas en cage et vous dégagez l'odeur de quelqu'un d'autre... Quelqu'un de mauvais et de rusé. Je ne vois pas en quoi vous pourriez m'aider. »
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Er schnüffelt laut, und seine Pupillen weiten sich ein wenig.{/n} "Wer seid Ihr, dass Ihr mir Hilfe anbietet? Ihr stinkt nach Xenos. Wie ich sehe, habt Ihr Freundschaft geschlossen. Ihr sitzt nicht in einem Käfig. Und Ihr riecht noch nach jemand anderem ... jemand Bösartigem und Hinterhältigem. Ihr könnt mir nicht helfen."
languages.original_text: {n}He loudly sniffs the air and his pupils dilate slightly.{/n} "Who are you to offer me help? You stink of xenos. I see you are on friendly terms with them. You are not sitting in a cage. And you smell of someone else... Someone spiteful and cunning. You cannot help me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er schnüffelt laut, und seine Pupillen weiten sich ein wenig.{/n} "Wer seid Ihr, dass Ihr mir Hilfe anbietet? Ihr stinkt nach Xenos. Wie ich sehe, habt Ihr Freundschaft geschlossen. Ihr sitzt nicht in einem Käfig. Und Ihr riecht noch nach jemand anderem ... jemand Bösartigem und Hinterhältigem. Ihr wärt keine geeignete Hilfe."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.original_text: {n}He loudly sniffs the air and his pupils dilate slightly.{/n} "Who are you to offer me help? You stink of xenos. I see you are on friendly terms with them. You are not sitting in a cage. And you smell of someone else... Someone spiteful and cunning. You cannot help me."

languages.text: {n}Yüksek sesle havayı kokluyor, göz bebekleri hafifçe genişliyor.{/n} "Sen kimsin de bana yardım teklif ediyorsun? Leş gibi zeno kokuyorsun. Bakıyorum onlarla pek samimisin. Kafeste de değilsin. Ayrıca üstüne bir başkasının, kindar ve kurnaz birinin kokusu sinmiş... Sen bana yardım edemezsin."
languages.original_text: {n}He loudly sniffs the air and his pupils dilate slightly.{/n} "Who are you to offer me help? You stink of xenos. I see you are on friendly terms with them. You are not sitting in a cage. And you smell of someone else... Someone spiteful and cunning. You cannot help me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yüksek sesle havayı kokluyor. Göz bebekleri hafifçe genişliyor.{/n} "Sen kimsin de bana yardım teklif ediyorsun? Leş gibi zeno kokuyorsun. Bakıyorum da onlarla pek samimisin. Kafeste de durmuyorsun. Ayrıca üstüne başka birinin kokusu da sinmiş. Kindar ve kurnaz biri... Sen bana yardım edemezsin."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison
